metadata.synopsis: Doubting artist has been kidnapped and is now enslaved by Zhentarim. Everything is peaceful around, for now.

0.speaker: Oskar Fevras
0.text: Look - there's no need for this. Free me now and I'll see that my patron rewards you!
0.context: NodeContext: He's trying to get the attention of his captors, trying to be personable and bargain his way free

6.speaker: Oskar Fevras
6.text: I need only tell her it's a gambling debt - it's happened before!

3.speaker: Oskar Fevras
3.text: Ye watching gods - I don't know any prayers, but rescue me from this pit and I swear that I will change.

2.speaker: Oskar Fevras
2.text: I'll drink only in the temple district, that you may keep an eye on me. Please.
2.context: NodeContext: As if making a concession if the gods save him

4.speaker: Oskar Fevras
4.text: Maybe I'll drink my paints, hm? You won't get your damn ransom then!
4.context: NodeContext: Challenging, petulant - they want to keep him prisoner so he's threatening to kill himself (not remotely intending to follow through on it, just out of spite)

5.speaker: Oskar Fevras
5.text: I have friends in the city - friends you do not want as enemies, you hear?!
5.context: NodeContext: Threatening, pompous - calling to his captors

1.speaker: Oskar Fevras
1.text: Gods - I'm going to die in the dark.
1.context: NodeContext: To himself - meek and defeated
